content: to start the heel gusset heel gusset at this point you ll continue working in the round again with rs of n3 facing you pick up and knit 16 stitches from along the side of the heel flap onto n3 pick up 1 extra stitch at the corner of the instep to eliminate having a small gap in the corner you should now have a total of 37 stitches on n3 continue knitting texture pattern like you did for the leg of the sock across n1 and n2 should be round 2 remember this is the front of the sock or the instep now you will need the extra needle that you put aside using this needle pick up 1 stitch in the corner of the instep and then pick up 16 stitches along the other edge of the heel flap continue knitting 10 stitches to the marker from old n3 now n4 remove marker this is now n3 using a separate needle knit across n4 you should now have the following number of stitches on each needle n1 16 n2 16 n3 27 n4 27 4 © the kitchen sink shop heel decrease round 1 continue with the texture pattern on n1 and n2 instep needles for n3 k1 ssk k to end that is to say continue with stockinette on n3 and n4 for n4 k to 3 stitches from the end k2tog k1 round 2 continue with texture pattern on n1 and n2 instep needles knit all stitches on n3 and n4 round 3 continue with texture pattern on n1 and n2 instep needles for n3 k1 ssk k to end for n4 k to 3 stitches from the end k2tog k1 round 4 continue with texture pattern on n1 and n2 instep needles knit all stitches on n3 and n4 repeat rounds 1 to 4 to decrease the gusset until you have a total of 64 stitches or 16 stitches on each of your 4 needles then continue knitting n1 and n2 in the texture pattern and n3 and n4 in stockinette until the foot of the sock measures approx 1 5 inches 3 5 cm shorter than your desired foot length from back of your heel to end of your big toe toe decrease round 1 n1 k1 ssk k to end n2 k to 3 stitches before end k2tog k1 n3 k1 ssk k to end n4 k to 3 stitches before end k2tog k1 round 2 k across all stitches n1-n4 repeats rounds 1 and 2 above until only 8 stitches remain on each needle total 32 stitches distribute evenly on 2 needles with your tapestry needle close the toe using the kitchener stitch or 3 needle bind off technique weave in ends soak and block if desired now grab a tea or coffee your favourite book and get ready to cast on sock number two 5 © the kitchen sink shop
